text: Brian Gerald Snitker (born October 17, 1955) is the manager of the Atlanta Braves. He was hired the Braves during the 2016 season. He never played for any Major League Baseball teams, but he did play minor league baseball in the Braves organization. He later managed several of the Braves' minor league teams and he also served as the third base coach for the Braves from 2007 to 2013. ==Other websites== * Managerial record at Baseball-Reference.com Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:Atlanta Braves Category:Major League Baseball managers
title: Brian Snitker
